column1:
.video-container { 
        position: relative; 
        padding-bottom: 56.25%; 
        padding-top: 30px; 
        height: 0; 
        overflow: hidden; 
    } 
    .video-container iframe, .video-container object, .video-container embed { 
        position: absolute; 
        top: 0; 
        left: 0; 
        width: 100%; 
        height: 100%;
    }
